Package com.shc.ahttp.client.request

This class provides the generic request classes for various HTTP operations such as GET, POST using Apache HTTP Client API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABasicAuthHttpRequestBase
    The Apache Basic Authentication supporting HTTP Request Base class serves as the base class for any HTTP requestMethods class and contains different methods which utilizes the Apache HTTP client APIs to perform all common tasks related to preparing, sending, HTTP requests as well as receiving and reading HTTP response.
    AHttpGetRequest
    The Apache HttpGetRequest class facilitates doing a get request to given url and supports Basic Authentication.
    AHttpPostRequest
    This class facilitates posting a request to given url and supports Basic Authentication.

Package com.shc.ahttp.client.request Description

This class provides the generic request classes for various HTTP operations such as GET, POST using Apache HTTP Client API.
See Also:
AHttpPostRequest, AHttpGetRequest
